subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Soccer
Music
lead_paragraph: If you watch the Champions League quarterfinals, you will hear soccer fans in their full-throated glory. Here is a look at popular chants among supporters of Tuesday’s home teams.
snippet: If you watch the Champions League quarterfinals, you will hear soccer fans in their full-throated glory. Here is a look at popular chants among supporters of Tuesday’s home teams.
